synopsis.text: Satan, Lucifer, and their minions from the western underworld are threatening to invade the eastern ghost realm and Earth. To combat this imminent danger, the young and inexperienced yama (god and judge of the dead) Xiao Luo must overcome her crippling fear of ghosts. With the help of her deceased father and king, who occasionally appears to guide her, and a motley crew of allies that includes the horse-headed and horse-faced guardians of the underworld and a small, mysterious being named Aoi, Xiao Luo must learn to harness her powers and face her fears in order to protect the realms of the living and the dead. Along the way, she will also encounter heavenly beings and powerful monkey warriors who will challenge her in unexpected ways. Will Xiao Luo be able to rise to the occasion and fulfill her destiny as a yama, or will her fear of ghosts be her downfall? Follow Xiao Luo's daily life as she navigates the treacherous waters of the underworld in this exciting and action-packed anime.
